00052 btSoftBodyTriangleCallback::btSoftBodyTriangleCallback(btDispatcher*  dispatcher,const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body0Wrap,const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body1Wrap,bool isSwapped):
00053 m_dispatcher(dispatcher),
00054 m_dispatchInfoPtr(0)
00055 {
00056         m_softBody = (isSwapped? (btSoftBody*)body1Wrap->getCollisionObject():(btSoftBody*)body0Wrap->getCollisionObject());
00057         m_triBody = isSwapped? body0Wrap->getCollisionObject():body1Wrap->getCollisionObject();
00058 
00059         //
00060         // create the manifold from the dispatcher 'manifold pool'
00061         //
00062         //        m_manifoldPtr = m_dispatcher->getNewManifold(m_convexBody,m_triBody);
00063 
00064         clearCache();
00065 }

00070         //      m_dispatcher->releaseManifold( m_manifoldPtr );

00075 void    btSoftBodyTriangleCallback::clearCache()
00076 {
00077         for (int i=0;i<m_shapeCache.size();i++)
00078         {
00079                 btTriIndex* tmp = m_shapeCache.getAtIndex(i);
00080                 btAssert(tmp);
00081                 btAssert(tmp->m_childShape);
00082                 m_softBody->getWorldInfo()->m_sparsesdf.RemoveReferences(tmp->m_childShape);//necessary?
00083                 delete tmp->m_childShape;
00084         }
00085         m_shapeCache.clear();
00086 }

00089 void btSoftBodyTriangleCallback::processTriangle(btVector3* triangle,int partId, int triangleIndex)
00090 {
00091         //just for debugging purposes
00092         //printf("triangle %d",m_triangleCount++);
00093         
00094         btCollisionAlgorithmConstructionInfo ci;
00095         ci.m_dispatcher1 = m_dispatcher;
00096 
00098         if (m_dispatchInfoPtr && m_dispatchInfoPtr->m_debugDraw && (m_dispatchInfoPtr->m_debugDraw->getDebugMode() &btIDebugDraw::DBG_DrawWireframe))
00099         {
00100                 btVector3 color(1,1,0);
00101                 const btTransform& tr = m_triBody->getWorldTransform();
00102                 m_dispatchInfoPtr->m_debugDraw->drawLine(tr(triangle[0]),tr(triangle[1]),color);
00103                 m_dispatchInfoPtr->m_debugDraw->drawLine(tr(triangle[1]),tr(triangle[2]),color);
00104                 m_dispatchInfoPtr->m_debugDraw->drawLine(tr(triangle[2]),tr(triangle[0]),color);
00105         }
00106 
00107         btTriIndex      triIndex(partId,triangleIndex,0);
00108         btHashKey<btTriIndex> triKey(triIndex.getUid());
00109 
00110 
00111         btTriIndex* shapeIndex = m_shapeCache[triKey];
00112         if (shapeIndex)
00113         {
00114                 btCollisionShape* tm = shapeIndex->m_childShape;
00115                 btAssert(tm);
00116 
00117                 //copy over user pointers to temporary shape
00118                 tm->setUserPointer(m_triBody->getCollisionShape()->getUserPointer());
00119 
00120                 btCollisionObjectWrapper softBody(0,m_softBody->getCollisionShape(),m_softBody,m_softBody->getWorldTransform(),-1,-1);
00121                 //btCollisionObjectWrapper triBody(0,tm, ob, btTransform::getIdentity());//ob->getWorldTransform());//??
00122                 btCollisionObjectWrapper triBody(0,tm, m_triBody, m_triBody->getWorldTransform(),partId, triangleIndex);
00123                 ebtDispatcherQueryType algoType = m_resultOut->m_closestPointDistanceThreshold > 0 ? BT_CLOSEST_POINT_ALGORITHMS : BT_CONTACT_POINT_ALGORITHMS;
00124                 btCollisionAlgorithm* colAlgo = ci.m_dispatcher1->findAlgorithm(&softBody,&triBody,0, algoType);//m_manifoldPtr);
00125 
00126                 colAlgo->processCollision(&softBody,&triBody,*m_dispatchInfoPtr,m_resultOut);
00127                 colAlgo->~btCollisionAlgorithm();
00128                 ci.m_dispatcher1->freeCollisionAlgorithm(colAlgo);
00129                 
00130                 return;
00131         }
00132 
00133         //aabb filter is already applied!       
00134 
00135         //btCollisionObject* colObj = static_cast<btCollisionObject*>(m_convexProxy->m_clientObject);
00136 
00137         //      if (m_softBody->getCollisionShape()->getShapeType()==
00138         {
00139                 //              btVector3 other;
00140                 btVector3 normal = (triangle[1]-triangle[0]).cross(triangle[2]-triangle[0]);
00141                 normal.normalize();
00142                 normal*= BT_SOFTBODY_TRIANGLE_EXTRUSION;
00143                 //              other=(triangle[0]+triangle[1]+triangle[2])*0.333333f;
00144                 //              other+=normal*22.f;
00145                 btVector3       pts[6] = {triangle[0]+normal,
00146                         triangle[1]+normal,
00147                         triangle[2]+normal,
00148                         triangle[0]-normal,
00149                         triangle[1]-normal,
00150                         triangle[2]-normal};
00151 
00152                 btConvexHullShape* tm = new btConvexHullShape(&pts[0].getX(),6);
00153 
00154 
00155                 //              btBU_Simplex1to4 tm(triangle[0],triangle[1],triangle[2],other);
00156 
00157                 //btTriangleShape tm(triangle[0],triangle[1],triangle[2]);      
00158                 //      tm.setMargin(m_collisionMarginTriangle);
00159 
00160                 //copy over user pointers to temporary shape
00161                 tm->setUserPointer(m_triBody->getCollisionShape()->getUserPointer());
00162 
00163                 
00164                 btCollisionObjectWrapper softBody(0,m_softBody->getCollisionShape(),m_softBody,m_softBody->getWorldTransform(),-1,-1);
00165                 btCollisionObjectWrapper triBody(0,tm, m_triBody, m_triBody->getWorldTransform(),partId, triangleIndex);//btTransform::getIdentity());//??
00166 
00167                 ebtDispatcherQueryType algoType = m_resultOut->m_closestPointDistanceThreshold > 0 ? BT_CLOSEST_POINT_ALGORITHMS : BT_CONTACT_POINT_ALGORITHMS;
00168                 btCollisionAlgorithm* colAlgo = ci.m_dispatcher1->findAlgorithm(&softBody,&triBody,0, algoType);//m_manifoldPtr);
00169 
00170                 colAlgo->processCollision(&softBody,&triBody,*m_dispatchInfoPtr,m_resultOut);
00171                 colAlgo->~btCollisionAlgorithm();
00172                 ci.m_dispatcher1->freeCollisionAlgorithm(colAlgo);
00173 
00174                 triIndex.m_childShape = tm;
00175                 m_shapeCache.insert(triKey,triIndex);
00176 
00177         }

00185 void    btSoftBodyTriangleCallback::setTimeStepAndCounters(btScalar collisionMarginTriangle,const btCollisionObjectWrapper* triBodyWrap, const btDispatcherInfo& dispatchInfo,btManifoldResult* resultOut)
00186 {
00187         m_dispatchInfoPtr = &dispatchInfo;
00188         m_collisionMarginTriangle = collisionMarginTriangle+btScalar(BT_SOFTBODY_TRIANGLE_EXTRUSION);
00189         m_resultOut = resultOut;
00190 
00191 
00192         btVector3       aabbWorldSpaceMin,aabbWorldSpaceMax;
00193         m_softBody->getAabb(aabbWorldSpaceMin,aabbWorldSpaceMax);
00194         btVector3 halfExtents = (aabbWorldSpaceMax-aabbWorldSpaceMin)*btScalar(0.5);
00195         btVector3 softBodyCenter = (aabbWorldSpaceMax+aabbWorldSpaceMin)*btScalar(0.5);
00196 
00197         btTransform softTransform;
00198         softTransform.setIdentity();
00199         softTransform.setOrigin(softBodyCenter);
00200 
00201         btTransform convexInTriangleSpace;
00202         convexInTriangleSpace = triBodyWrap->getWorldTransform().inverse() * softTransform;
00203         btTransformAabb(halfExtents,m_collisionMarginTriangle,convexInTriangleSpace,m_aabbMin,m_aabbMax);
00204 }

00212 void btSoftBodyConcaveCollisionAlgorithm::processCollision (const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body0Wrap,const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body1Wrap,const btDispatcherInfo& dispatchInfo,btManifoldResult* resultOut)
00213 {
00214 
00215 
00216         //btCollisionObject* convexBody = m_isSwapped ? body1 : body0;
00217         const btCollisionObjectWrapper* triBody = m_isSwapped ? body0Wrap : body1Wrap;
00218 
00219         if (triBody->getCollisionShape()->isConcave())
00220         {
00221 
00222 
00223                 const btCollisionObject*        triOb = triBody->getCollisionObject();
00224                 const btConcaveShape* concaveShape = static_cast<const btConcaveShape*>( triOb->getCollisionShape());
00225 
00226                 //      if (convexBody->getCollisionShape()->isConvex())
00227                 {
00228                         btScalar collisionMarginTriangle = concaveShape->getMargin();
00229 
00230                         //                      resultOut->setPersistentManifold(m_btSoftBodyTriangleCallback.m_manifoldPtr);
00231                         m_btSoftBodyTriangleCallback.setTimeStepAndCounters(collisionMarginTriangle,triBody,dispatchInfo,resultOut);
00232 
00233                 
00234                         concaveShape->processAllTriangles( &m_btSoftBodyTriangleCallback,m_btSoftBodyTriangleCallback.getAabbMin(),m_btSoftBodyTriangleCallback.getAabbMax());
00235 
00236                         //      resultOut->refreshContactPoints();
00237 
00238                 }
00239 
00240         }
00241 
00242 }

00244 
00245 btScalar btSoftBodyConcaveCollisionAlgorithm::calculateTimeOfImpact(btCollisionObject* body0,btCollisionObject* body1,const btDispatcherInfo& dispatchInfo,btManifoldResult* resultOut)
00246 {
00247         (void)resultOut;
00248         (void)dispatchInfo;
00249         btCollisionObject* convexbody = m_isSwapped ? body1 : body0;
00250         btCollisionObject* triBody = m_isSwapped ? body0 : body1;
00251 
00252 
00253         //quick approximation using raycast, todo: hook up to the continuous collision detection (one of the btConvexCast)
00254 
00255         //only perform CCD above a certain threshold, this prevents blocking on the long run
00256         //because object in a blocked ccd state (hitfraction<1) get their linear velocity halved each frame...
00257         btScalar squareMot0 = (convexbody->getInterpolationWorldTransform().getOrigin() - convexbody->getWorldTransform().getOrigin()).length2();
00258         if (squareMot0 < convexbody->getCcdSquareMotionThreshold())
00259         {
00260                 return btScalar(1.);
00261         }
00262 
00263         //const btVector3& from = convexbody->m_worldTransform.getOrigin();
00264         //btVector3 to = convexbody->m_interpolationWorldTransform.getOrigin();
00265         //todo: only do if the motion exceeds the 'radius'
00266 
00267         btTransform triInv = triBody->getWorldTransform().inverse();
00268         btTransform convexFromLocal = triInv * convexbody->getWorldTransform();
00269         btTransform convexToLocal = triInv * convexbody->getInterpolationWorldTransform();
00270 
00271         struct LocalTriangleSphereCastCallback  : public btTriangleCallback
00272         {
00273                 btTransform m_ccdSphereFromTrans;
00274                 btTransform m_ccdSphereToTrans;
00275                 btTransform     m_meshTransform;
00276 
00277                 btScalar        m_ccdSphereRadius;
00278                 btScalar        m_hitFraction;
00279 
00280 
00281                 LocalTriangleSphereCastCallback(const btTransform& from,const btTransform& to,btScalar ccdSphereRadius,btScalar hitFraction)
00282                         :m_ccdSphereFromTrans(from),
00283                         m_ccdSphereToTrans(to),
00284                         m_ccdSphereRadius(ccdSphereRadius),
00285                         m_hitFraction(hitFraction)
00286                 {                       
00287                 }
00288 
00289 
00290                 virtual void processTriangle(btVector3* triangle, int partId, int triangleIndex)
00291                 {
00292                         (void)partId;
00293                         (void)triangleIndex;
00294                         //do a swept sphere for now
00295                         btTransform ident;
00296                         ident.setIdentity();
00297                         btConvexCast::CastResult castResult;
00298                         castResult.m_fraction = m_hitFraction;
00299                         btSphereShape   pointShape(m_ccdSphereRadius);
00300                         btTriangleShape triShape(triangle[0],triangle[1],triangle[2]);
00301                         btVoronoiSimplexSolver  simplexSolver;
00302                         btSubsimplexConvexCast convexCaster(&pointShape,&triShape,&simplexSolver);
00303                         //GjkConvexCast convexCaster(&pointShape,convexShape,&simplexSolver);
00304                         //ContinuousConvexCollision convexCaster(&pointShape,convexShape,&simplexSolver,0);
00305                         //local space?
00306 
00307                         if (convexCaster.calcTimeOfImpact(m_ccdSphereFromTrans,m_ccdSphereToTrans,
00308                                 ident,ident,castResult))
00309                         {
00310                                 if (m_hitFraction > castResult.m_fraction)
00311                                         m_hitFraction = castResult.m_fraction;
00312                         }
00313 
00314                 }
00315 
00316         };
00317 
00318 
00319 
00320 
00321 
00322         if (triBody->getCollisionShape()->isConcave())
00323         {
00324                 btVector3 rayAabbMin = convexFromLocal.getOrigin();
00325                 rayAabbMin.setMin(convexToLocal.getOrigin());
00326                 btVector3 rayAabbMax = convexFromLocal.getOrigin();
00327                 rayAabbMax.setMax(convexToLocal.getOrigin());
00328                 btScalar ccdRadius0 = convexbody->getCcdSweptSphereRadius();
00329                 rayAabbMin -= btVector3(ccdRadius0,ccdRadius0,ccdRadius0);
00330                 rayAabbMax += btVector3(ccdRadius0,ccdRadius0,ccdRadius0);
00331 
00332                 btScalar curHitFraction = btScalar(1.); //is this available?
00333                 LocalTriangleSphereCastCallback raycastCallback(convexFromLocal,convexToLocal,
00334                         convexbody->getCcdSweptSphereRadius(),curHitFraction);
00335 
00336                 raycastCallback.m_hitFraction = convexbody->getHitFraction();
00337 
00338                 btCollisionObject* concavebody = triBody;
00339 
00340                 btConcaveShape* triangleMesh = (btConcaveShape*) concavebody->getCollisionShape();
00341 
00342                 if (triangleMesh)
00343                 {
00344                         triangleMesh->processAllTriangles(&raycastCallback,rayAabbMin,rayAabbMax);
00345                 }
00346 
00347 
00348 
00349                 if (raycastCallback.m_hitFraction < convexbody->getHitFraction())
00350                 {
00351                         convexbody->setHitFraction( raycastCallback.m_hitFraction);
00352                         return raycastCallback.m_hitFraction;
00353                 }
00354         }
00355 
00356         return btScalar(1.);
00357 
00358 }
